guardians.title: Titan
guardians.description: Titan is the tank of the group. Reminds me of the Hulk! Titan SMASH!

guardians.title: Hunter
guardians.description: Hunter is the ranged attack of the group. Scout Rifles are best with the guy.

guardians.title: Warlock
guardians.description: The AOE damage of the group. Watch out for that Nova Bomb
